data.eml:eml: A new species of Leptolalax (Anura: Megophryidae) from the sacred groves of Mawphlang, Meghalaya, north-eastern India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Das, Indraneil, Lyngdoh, Ronald K., Rangad, Duwaki, Hooroo, Rupa N. K. (2010): A new species of Leptolalax (Anura: Megophryidae) from the sacred groves of Mawphlang, Meghalaya, north-eastern India. Zootaxa 2339: 44-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275526
